item.title: ROP Emporium - Pivot Writeup
item.description: I recently came across the ropemporium challenges while looking for resources to learn Return Oriented Programming (ROP). The challenges are very good and the difficulty increases with the problems which keeps things interesting. The challenge this writeup is about is the pivot challenge. I will be using the 32 bit binary for the explanation purpose but the solution is pretty much the same for both 32 and 64 bit.
